title: Panel and Screening: "TIGERMAN"
hero_caption: <p>tanley Tigerman. Courtesy of the Chicago Architectural Club.</p>
description:
This event premiers rough-cut footage of a documentary film in progress about legendary Chicago architect Stanley Tigerman. The film covers his life and legacy as an influential designer, critic, writer, artist, activist, educator, and provocateur. A brief description of the project with film footage kicks off the evening, followed by a lively panel discussion with the film team and architect.

Presented by the Architecture and Design Society in partnership with the Chicago Architectural Club

*Museum admission is free for Illinois residents every Thursday, 5:00–8:00—including during this event.
